sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Procter & Gamble topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.9%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble has lost about 16.8% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Apple, trading down 1.5%.
Apple is showing a gain of 12.6% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are American Express, trading down 1.5%, and Johnson & Johnson, trading up 0.9% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
